title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival. Directed by Christopher Nolan.

title: Gentlemen
description: Gangsters of all stripes share a drug farm. Guy Ritchie's twisted action comedy with Matthew McConaughey and Hugh Grant

title: Shutter Island
description: Two bailiffs investigate the escape of a patient from a dark mental hospital. Paranoid thriller with Leonardo DiCaprio

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: Liquid cyborg, nuclear apocalypse and the cult 'Hasta la vista, baby'. James Cameron's immortal masterpiece

title: F1
description: An action-packed drama set in the world of Formula 1 racing, starring Brad Pitt.

title: Nezha Defeats the Dragon King
description: A self-confident boy has a week to save his friend and his hometown. The highest-grossing cartoon in history.

title: Guns
description: A thriller and detective story about an object that can make one's wishes come true, with a high price to pay.

title: Superman
description: The new film about Superman, a superhero with incredible powers who fights for justice and protects the world.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A coming-of-age story about a Viking boy and a friendly dragon who defy their traditions to form an unlikely bond.
